Can you give any further info on what elements you would have been dropping from the palette when this happened?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Can you give any further info on what elements you would have been dropping
> from the palette when this happened?  

I was dropping a Command Button in front of another Command Button. 

<h:form><h:panelGrid border="1" columns="2">
		<h:outputText value="item1"></h:outputText>
		<h:outputText value="item2"></h:outputText>
		<h:outputText value="item3"></h:outputText>
		<h:outputText value="item4"></h:outputText>
	</h:panelGrid>
		<h:commandButton value="CommandButton" rendered="false"></h:commandButton>
I cannot reproduce, but I have guarded against the exception and now log the case.  Until we get a reproduce (the log will now get a stack trace) I'm going to mark this Resolved Later.
